spendProfileMessages.costGuidanceIndirectCosts:
Indirect costs, or overheads, cover costs which are not directly linked to the action but are necessary to carry out the project. They are declared on the basis of a flat rate of 25% of eligible direct costs excluding:

  - volunteer costs
  - subcontacting costs
  - costs of providing financial support to third parties (if applicable)
  - costs from specific cost categories that include indirect costs e.g., costs for energy efficiency measures in buildings
